item.title: The U.K.’s About-Face on Puberty Blockers for Children
item.description: A new major clinical trial exposing minors to puberty suppression represents an indefensible course change for the U.K.

item.title: Creedalism Needs Culture
item.description: When it comes to American identity, creedalism and culture aren’t mutually exclusive. Indeed, they must be melded.

item.title: Why Is Princeton Clamping Down on Recording On-Campus Events?
item.description: The timing of these new rules is rather suspicious.

item.title: Appeals Court: Alina Habba May Not Serve as De Facto U.S. Attorney
item.description: Trump and Bondi’s finagling with the appointment process has gotten them nowhere.

item.title: No, Trump Is Not to Blame for the National Guard Shooting
item.description: The reaction in the media to this attack is as predictable as it is revolting.
